dict.acceptation: 信任；信托；照管；受托基金机构；
对…有信心，依赖于；盼望，自信地期待，设想；相信；让他人照管，托管；

sent.orig: Methods The TRUST test was done with the clients blood sera.
sent.trans: 对就诊人员的血清进行TRUST检测。

sent.orig: Use TRUST titre and TPHA to conform syphilis positive.
sent.trans: 对梅毒阳性者，用甲苯胺红不加热血清反应素试验(TRUST)方法查滴度，梅素螺旋体血凝试验(tpha)方法确证。

sent.orig: The ELISA was more sensitive and specific than the TRUST, with high concordance with the TPPA.
sent.trans: ELISA的敏感性、特异性都优于TRUST,与TPPA符合率高。

sent.orig: In STD patients 40 were TPHA,WB and EIA-positive but 32 were TRUST-positive.
sent.trans: 对照组中TPHA阳性40例，免疫印迹法确认阳性40例，酶免疫法阳性40例，TRUST阳性32例。

sent.orig: The trust business category contains fields such as commercial affairs trust, civil trust, public good trust.
sent.trans: 信托业务范畴含商事信托、民事信托、公益信托等领域。
